>>===== MODE =====>>
citation
<<===== MODE =====<<



>>===== RESULT =====>>
四月 1, 1976
<<===== RESULT =====<<


>>===== CSL =====>>
<style 
      xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl"
      class="note"
      version="1.0">
  <info>
    <id />
    <title />
    <updated>2009-08-10T04:49:00+09:00</updated>
  </info>
  <citation>
    <layout>
       <date variable="issued" form="text" date-parts="year-month-day"/>
    </layout>
  </citation>
</style>
<<===== CSL =====<<


>>===== INPUT =====>>
[
    {
        "title": "Some Book or Other",
        "id": "ITEM-1", 
        "issued": {
            "raw": "四月 1, 1976"
        }, 
        "type": "book"
    }
]
